00026 void Animator::Set_animation(const std::string& a, bool ihflip)
00027 {
00028         hflip = ihflip;
00029         if(animation != animations[a])
00030         {
00031                 animation = animations[a];
00032                 delta=0;
00033                 frame=0;
00034         }
00035 }

00037 
00038 void Animator::Update(double idelta)
00039 {
00040         if(!animation)
00041                 return;
00042         delta+=idelta;
00043         while(animation->Frame_time()<=delta)
00044         {
00045                 delta-=animation->Frame_time();
00046                 ++frame;
00047                 if(frame >= animation->Number_of_frames())
00048                         frame=0;
00049         }
00050 }

00055         Render(position.X(), position.Y(), scale);
00056 }

00058 
00059 void Animator::Render(float x, float y, float scale)
00060 {
00061         if(animation)
00062                 animation->Render_frame(frame, x, y, scale, hflip);
00063 }

00066 Animations Load_animations(const std::string& filename, Resource_manager& resource_manager)
00067 {
00068         std::string folder;
00069         size_t pos = filename.find_last_of('/');
00070         if(pos!=std::string::npos)
00071                 folder = filename.substr(0, pos+1);
00072 
00073         std::ifstream file;
00074         file.open(filename.c_str());
00075 
00076         Animations animations;
00077         Animation* animation = NULL;
00078         std::string name;
00079 
00080         bool loading = false;
00081         while(!file.eof())
00082         {
00083                 std::string line;
00084                 std::getline(file, line);
00085 
00086                 if(line == "start")
00087                 {
00088                         animation = new Animation;
00089                         std::getline(file, line);
00090                         name = line;
00091                         loading = true;
00092                         continue;
00093                 }
00094                 if(line == "end")
00095                 {
00096                         animations[name] = animation;
00097                         loading = false;
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 if(loading)
00101                 {
00102                         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL1, std::cout, "Animations Load_animations()\n\tfolder: \"%s\"\n\tline: \"%s\"\n", folder.c_str(), line.c_str());
00103                         Image_resource* image = resource_manager.Load<Image_resource>(folder+line);
00104                         if(image)
00105                         {
00106                                 animation->Add_frame(image->Get_allegro_bitmap());
00107                         }
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         file.close();
00112         return animations;
00113 }
